хороший сюжет, интересные и смешные диалоги, кооп со сложными камерами, одиночка также радует своими головоломками, которые я правда знаю уже наизусть.

I still love this game, even after all these years

9 years after portal 2 was released, it still  rocks. Barely ever games are still that good after such a long time. Portal 2 is not only doing great in gameplay, but also in graphics. But those are really not important, because true magic of this incredible piece of arts lays somewhere in between the storyline, funny and original narration, and questions about humanity put somewhere between the lines. Portal is a full piece. I mean it gives you both laughter, irritation and moves you  to ask questions what determines art, life and so on. This part of Portal series is way more developed, having a lot of new features compared to no. 1. It also introduces Co-OP mode, with different story, and different puzzles. Problems to solve themselves are not really that demanding, but will give you some headscrataches, irritation and perhaps some good laughter if you play with friend.
I strongly recommend this game, to anyone who appreciates aesthetics, well directed plot, and cutting edge solutions in video games. I’m willing to admit, that portal 2 was the best game I have ever played.
